turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi. How can i help you today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good. Which starbucks should i place the order at for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Starbucks on Pike Street in Seattle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a tall chai tea latte with almond milk, sugar, and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. Did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be all. Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so the order is: 1 tall chai tea latte with almond milk, sugar, and whipped cream from starbucks on pike street in seattle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total is $3.40. Should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order for you. It'll be ready for pick up in 10 minutes. The receipt will be sent to you via text shortly. Did you need my help with anything else?
